reviewText: This is a Region 4 disk.  No problem.  I have a multi region player.  Arrived quickly in perfect condition.

Continuing a "Third Man Out" line, brave detective underwent a string of mortally-dangerous encounters to secure surprising three million dollar donation his partner-a social worker was miraculously given a humanistic youth program to run. It is a good movie if even not embedding same gender affairs issues, of which emphasising a social/professional "normality" of gay professionals is the most.

I didn't realize that Here! TV cancelled this excellent series until I visited Chad Allen's website.  I know Ron Oliver, the producer, has two finished scripts and was ready to proceed until Here! TV pulled the plug.  This series is good enough to be on Showtime or HBO.
And, to add insult to injury, only Australia has been able to release a full DVD of "Ice Blues".  I also wrote Here! TV and got a lame response.
If anyone hears of the DVD of "Ice Blues" being released in the USA or of any news of the series resuming, please let us know!!!

Loved this last story in the Donald Strachey series. Why is excellent series has been cancelled by Here! tv I don't know. Also a mystery is why this DVD is not available any where else other than Australia (region 4) Thankfully Amazon have it available through one of its out lets and I highly recommend it. Great story, acting and production. Get it now before copies run out.
I have seen reviews of this movie on other DVDs and yet it is not availabe in the USA format.......what gives?
I love Chad Allen in this.  I have watched it several times and it is great.  Received it on time and in excellent condition.

I can't wait for "Ice Blues" to come out. I have all the Donald Strachey Mysteries and they are all great.
I e-mailed Here! TV to see if they could tell me when it will be released... Following is the response they sent me...

"Thank you very much for your interest in here! We are so glad that you are enjoying our programming and hope that you continue to do so. To find out about purchasing DVD's please visit us at [...] To learn about when a program is scheduled to be released please check on amazon.com or other retailers. Not all titles will have scheduled release dates as of now so be sure to check for updates.  We appreciate your continued support and value your opinion.  Please let us know if you have any additional questions.

here! Networks"

In other words they aren't telling.  I don't understand why it's taking so long to release.

I enjoyed "Ice-Blues" on "here-tv" many months ago, not long after "On the Other Hand Death." Why one is on DVD already, whereas the other is not, is a surprise. I hope they release Ice Blues soon, to add to my Donald Strachey collection.

I've seen the trailer for "Ice Blues" on the DVD for "On The Other Hand, Death". Judging from the trailer, it looks like another terrific Donald Strachey mystery.
When will this movie be available on USA format? Please don't deny us fans of more Strachey!
